ygData.subject: Re: Enchanter Research....not always necessary..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... All correct except wrog spell, you are refering to the lvl 4 spell called mesmerize. The lvl 16 spell called mesmerization is believed to be a research
ygData.messageBody:
>
>Mesmerization a research spell? I have it now, bought it in Ak'Anon,
>very useful spell btw, not many people really understand it.
>
>It does two things, stuns a mob for about 30 seconds or until it takes
>DAMAGE, very important there as you can still debuff the mob without
>taking off the stun effect. Secondly, and most importantly, it ERASES a
>mobs hate list at the moment its cast. Think about it.
>I use it for soloing yellows all the time.
>_________________________________________________________

All correct except wrog spell, you are refering to the lvl 4 spell called
mesmerize. The lvl 16 spell called mesmerization is believed to be a
research spell. IT is an area attack version of mesmerize.

Leaokk
